loans.name: Loimata

texts.en:
Loimata is a 40-year-old married woman with three children. For many years, she has been growing bananas, yams, taro, and other crops to earn a living. Loimata has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

Loimata is requesting a loan to buy chemicals for her farm along with nails, iron roofing materials, and cement to improve her home. She hopes to use the profit from her loan to help with her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals for her farm and nails, iron roofing materials, and cement to improve her home

loans.name: Leuluasi

texts.en:
Leuluasi is 55 years old and married with four children. For many years, she has owned and operated a small store where she sells items such as sugar, flour, laundry soap, raw meat, and other products. She became a member of SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital for her business.

Leuluasi is requesting a loan to buy a sack of sugar, a bag of rice, a box of chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, cartons of milk, and Vailima beers. She hopes to use the profit from her loan to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, cartons of milk, and Vailima beers

loans.name: Tavhida

texts.ru: Тавхиде 45 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании 3 детей. Тавхида является основной кормилицей своих 3 детей, так как ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Тавхида имеет высшее экономическое образование. Она имеет более чем 20 лет стаж работы. Она более чем одного года работает в ИМОН ИНТЕРНЕШНЛ бухгалтером. Она является одной из лучших работников организации. Тавхида старается, чтобы ее дети были образованными и интеллигентными людьми. Ее старшая дочь студентка 3 курса факультета Иностранных языков. Вторая дочь студентка 1 курса юридического факультета. Тавхида тратит свои деньги для образования своих детей. Она уже несколько лет планирует отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом имеет плохое состояние. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта дома, а также покупки мебели. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Tavhida is 45 years old and she is married with three children.  She is the main breadwinner for her three children, as her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  Tavhida has a higher education in economics and she has more than 20 years of work experience.  For more than a year, she has been working as a bookkeeper at IMON International.  She is one of the best workers in the organization.  Tavhida works hard so her children will be educated and intelligent people.  Her eldest daughter is a third-year student in the department of foreign languages and her other daughter is a first-year law student.  Tavhida spends her money on the education of her children.  For a few years, she has planned to make repairs to their home, as it is in a poor condition.  She is asking for a loan of 6,000 somoni to buy building materials to repair her home, and also to purchase furniture.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing her house and to buy furniture

loans.name: Theophile

texts.en: Theophile is 24 years old. He is single and has been in business for the past six years. Theophile, would like to sell spare parts of motorcycles in conjunction with his already existing business of motorbike transportation.He has requested this loan to buy more spare parts for the motorbike for sale. The profits from the business will be used to put aside more savings.

loans.use: To buy more spare parts for sale.

loans.name: Valeri

texts.en:
Valeri and his small family live in Vnadzor city. Valeri has no higher education, and it is already ten years that he has his own modest business. He works in a small garage adjacent to the building that he lives, where he repairs engines and paints cars which are mainly produced in the Soviet Union. He also makes car plate smoothing. Valeri has many loyal customers who trust their cars only to him. 

His work is hard and requires more time but Valeri never complains. He is always ready to help and give some advice to anyone who has some problems with his car. The income from his business barely covers his family’s needs, but he is sure that his business will go ahead, if he can manage to buy some new tools that he needs for car repairing. Valeri asks for a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams to buy a welding machine. 

He is sure that his deal with Kiva lenders will be good for his future.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine

loans.name: Lady

texts.es: Lady, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer amable y alegre. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Luís, quien trabaja en una empresa como conductor de tractores. Tiene 3 hijos de 21, 14, y 04 años de edad respectivamente. El trabajo de Lady consiste en la venta de bebidas gasificadas como gaseosas de diferentes sabores y cervezas de marcas distintas y golosinas tales como galletas , caramelos , chicles , entre otros.  Cuenta con una refrigeradora para mantener heladas sus bebidas. Su actividad lo realiza en un local en el interior de su vivienda propia , lleva 03 años en esta actividad económica. Se inició en esta actividad par ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. En el futuro piensa alquilar un local comercial en una buena ubicación para vender golosinas al por mayor.Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 04  con Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para continuar con su trabajo.Con el monto solicitado deS/.1000 soles comprará bebidas gasificadas como cervezas de diferentes marcas y gaseosas de distintos sabores , también comprará golosinas  como galletas, chocolates, caramelos, etc.
texts.en:
Lady is a friendly and happy 36-year-old woman. She lives in a house she owns with her husband Luís, who works at a company as a tractor driver. She has three children aged 21, 14, and 4 years respectively. Lady's work consists of selling carbonated beverages like soft drinks of different flavors, beers of various brands, and sweets like cookies, caramels and gum, among other things. She has a refrigerator to keep her drinks cold. She has had this business in a space inside her home for 3 years. She started this business to help her husband with their living expenses.

In the future she thinks she will rent a commercial space in a good location to sell sweets wholesale. This will be her 4th loan with Kiva and she feels very grateful for the financial support that she receives to continue with her work. With the requested amount of 1,000 Peruvian nuevos soles, she will buy carbonated beverages like beers of different brands and soft drinks of various flavors. She will also buy sweets like cookies, chocolates, caramels, etc.

loans.use: to buy carbonated beverages and sweets

loans.name: Nat's Group

texts.en:
Nat is aged 34 years. She lives with her family in a rural village, in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is married and has four children, all of whom are dependent on her and still in school. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for ten years. The current business earns her family about 31,000 KHR per day, and they manage to save about 20,000 KHR each day for future needs.

This is the third loan for Nat with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She completely paid back the past loans. Nat wants to use her portion of this new loan to buy fertilizer and rice seed to use on her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthily and fruitfully, so as to sell it for a good price and improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farmland

loans.name: Seu

texts.en: Seu is 43 years old and married with 7 children. She runs a small business selling biscuits, donuts, cooked noddles, etc. in her community and has been doing this for many years. Seu has requested a loan to buy a bag of rice, onions, curry, noodles and foil for her business. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Seu will try to expand her business to all schools in her district.

loans.use: to buy a bag of rice, onions, curry, noodles and foil

loans.name: Sergelenbaatar

texts.en:
Mr. Sergelenbaatar, 53 years old, lives with his wife and children in Erdenet, the third largest city in Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He has been working as an electrician since 1980 and accumulated a vast amount of experience. His wife has the position of supervisor at a private business entity, and before this job she used to run a hock shop. 

The house they live in has been deteriorating over the years and needs some serious repair. So Sergelenbaatar is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as cement, planks, fiberglass and foam. Using those materials, he can repair and insulate his old house. As a result, the family will reduce its coal consumption, thus releasing fewer pollutants which will contribute to the efforts against air pollution. He is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials.

loans.name: Saeuomalo

texts.en:
Saeuomalo is 21 years old and married with no children. For the past two years, she has run a small business selling fish in her community. Saeuomalo joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital.

Saeuomalo is requesting a loan to buy fishing lures and a rod, net, and spears. With the earnings from her loan, she will help provide for her family’s daily needs.

loans.use: to buy fishing lures and a rod, net, and spears

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.en:
Jonathan, of Rizal, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, is a married man with two children. 

For a living, he owns and manages his piggery, raising piglets for sale. In 2011, he joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) and he gains access to microfinance services from the Cooperative.

Recently, Jonathan requested a loan in the amount of PHP 2,500 to purchase feed. He plans to renovate his livestock's shelter, to be used for piggery expansion.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah and Manuel are deaf and have been in business for five years, using the sign language symbol for “I love you” as their signature on every wooden craft they complete.

Returning clients of Accion Texas Inc., the husband and wife create crafts from wood and run the San Antonio business S & M Crafts along with one full-time employee--creating items such as welcome signs, wind chimes, baskets, frames and other wooden home décor.  Whether you are looking for something for yourself or a gift, you can find it here.

To earn profits, the couple attends craft shows where they present and sell their designs. To increase the number of craft shows they attend, they needed a loan.  This is when they returned to Accion. Once they had applied and were approved, Sarah and Manuel increased their sales and secured spots at craft shows around the state.

loans.use: to increase their sales and secure spots at craft shows .

loans.name: Agustin Antonio

texts.es: Don Agustín, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, desde hace varios años cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarla a los mercados de compra-venta de granos básicos, con las ganancias que obtienen de las ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, don  Agustín esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los insumos necesarios como:Herbicidas, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, etc. para seguir con sus cosechas y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Agustin lives in his own house with his wife and four children. He has been growing corn and beans for several years. When the harvest is ready, he stores it in the silos that can be seen in the picture, so that later he can sell it at the markets where people buy and sell basic grains. He uses the profits that he makes from the sales to cover some of the household expenses. Agustin is requesting a loan to be able to buy the necessary supplies such as herbicides, fertilizers, manure, seeds, etc. to continue growing his crops and to be able to give his family everything it needs.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, fertilizers, manure, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Battumur

texts.en:
Mr. Battumur, 59 years old, lives with his wife and children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He has been working as an engineer at a power station since 2011, and before this job he worked at various places and accumulated a vast amount of experience in engineering. 

His wife is disabled and gets a state pension. As he and his wife get older, they need an automobile to drive to their workplace and home. So, he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase an automobile which has an electric engine. 

Electric cars contribute to cleaner air in cities because they produce no harmful pollution through the tailpipe from the onboard source of power, such as particulates (soot), volatile organic compounds, hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, ozone, lead, and various oxides of nitrogen. Considering the advantages of electric cars, it is the best option to purchase this car which will contribute to the family's work and health as well as to the environment. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase an electric car.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a 41-year-old married woman with 4 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro crops and bananas. She also has a pancake business to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

She has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a back bag sprayer, a sack of flour, dripping oil, a bag of  sugar and baking powder.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Susana hopes to help with her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a back bag sprayer, a sack of flour, dripping oil, a bag of  sugar and baking powder.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 50 years old and married with three children. Her husband is a driver. Jacqueline supports him by raising pigs to sell in the the community of Rizal, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

Jacqueline is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan from GDMPC to purchase piglets to raise and sell. In the future, she plans to expand her business to gain more income and provide better living conditions for her entire family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to raise

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.en: Cornelia is from Rizal, Ozamis City. She is a 53-year-old married mom with four children. To make a living, Cornelia plants, harvests and sells vegetables. Aside from her garden, she also operates a business weaving nipa for sale. Cornelia is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional materials for weaving. Cornelia has been a member of GDMPC since 2011. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to let her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials to be used for weaving.

loans.name: Tunas Rahayu Group

texts.en: The Tunas Rahayu group is continuing its loan. Ni Putu is using her portion of the loan to buy two superior-quality piglets and feed. With the increase in prices for pigs, she expects a satisfactory profit. Ni Putu is very grateful because this business has proven to help her family's income. Her children can go to school and she can meet their everyday needs. She has a plan to build a nicer house.

loans.use: to purchase two superior piglets and feed.

loans.name: Batjargal

texts.en:
Mr. Batjargal, 40 years old, lives with his mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live in a two-room apartment. He has been working as a foreign relations manager at a private business entity since 2010. Before this job, he had been working for fourteen years in the USA on an employment contract. His mother has retired from work and now gets a state pension. 

During the winter time, the apartment they live in loses its heat through walls and windows, and they use lots of hot water to heat their home. So Batjargal is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase vacuum insulated windows, fiberglass and hardwood floors. 

After installing the vacuum windows and hardwood floors and insulating the walls with fiberglass, the apartment will no longer lose its heat and will preserve energy and provide comfortable and warm accommodations for its owners. Batjargal is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors and fiberglass.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin of Sinara Bajo, Jimenez, provides for his family through his construction supplies business. He is 52 years old, married, and tries his best to earn. Aside from doing this business, he also has a farm, planting and harvesting rice for sale and for family consumption. He joined GDMPC micro finance in 2011 and thanks them for the trust they provide to him. 

Recently, Benjamin borrowed an amount of 9,000 PHP to finance the labor costs for weeding, maintenance and land preparation. He desires to improve his business and to multiply his income in the future.

loans.use: to finance the labor costs for weeding, maintenance, and land preparation.

loans.name: Pelemoni

texts.en: Pelemoni is 35 years old and married with four children. For three years she has run a small business selling fish in her community. Pelemoni has requested a loan to buy lures, fishing nets, goggles, a spear and a canoe. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. Pelemoni will use her earnings to help pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy lures, fishing nets, goggles, a spear and a canoe.

loans.name: Faatuatua

texts.en:
Faatuatua is a 26-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Faatuatua has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives and crops. 

She became a member of SPBD in 2013. With her profits, Faatuatua hopes to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, bush knives, fertilizer and crops.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en: Ricardo is from San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. He is 60 years old. Ricardo is married and has five children. He has a farm where he grows a variety of plants. To purchase fertilizer, such as manure, he borrowed an amount of 35,000 from GDMPC micro-credit (which he joined in 2010). Ricardo hopes to invest more in this business in order to generate more income for better living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

location.town: San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Fuataga

texts.en: Fuataga is 45 years old and married with four children. For many years she has run a small business selling fish in her community. Fuataga has requested a loan to buy fishing nets, spears, a fishing rod and fishing torch. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fuataga will buy a modern fishing boat.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, spears, a fishing rod and fishing torch.

loans.name: Simplicio

texts.en: Simplicio is 60 years old and married with three children. He lives in Kahayagan East, Aurora. For the past years, Simplicio has operated a food vending business. He uses his motorcycle to deliver his food and earns a monthly income of 15,000 PHP. Aside from vending, he also offers motor transportation services in his community to earn additional income for his family. Recently he requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to repair his motor. He plans to use the profit from his loan to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle's motor.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en: Abel is a permanent resident of Nyakayojo, a village in Mbarara district, and is 47 years old. He is married and has 8 children and 3 dependents from his aunt who died 5 years ago. Due to the fact that all his children and dependents are in school, he was forced by circumstances to do the business of piggery and pig butchery in order to earn a living for his family and dependents. This business has grown, enabling him to support his family and even pay school fees for his children. He has a small semi-permanent house for his family but the house is old to the extent that it leaks during rainy season. He is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 Uganda Shillings (UGX) to renovate his house and the balance will be used to clear tuition for the children and dependents.In the photograph is Abel with his wife who also signed the kiva waiver.

loans.use: To buy materials and hire labour for renovating his residential house

loans.name: Valasi

texts.en: Valasi is 21 years old and single with one child. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for many years. Valasi has requested a loan to buy fishing nets, spears, goggles, a cooler and a new canoe. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Valasi will improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, spears, goggles,a cooler and a new canoe.

loans.name: Abundio

texts.en: Abundio of Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental is a 23-year-old single man providing motor transport services in his community. He's been doing this business for two years. In 2012, he joined GDMPC micro credit, gaining access to its micro finance services. Recently, he borrowed an amount of 10,000 PHP to purchase a new set of tires and to renew his license. He plans to save his revenue from this business for maintenance and to provide his family's basic needs.

loans.use: To purchase a new set of tires and to renew his license.

loans.name: Ella Cecilia

texts.en:
Ella Cecilia is a 27-year-old married woman who lives in Rizal, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. To help her husband, she manages her own retail store, selling dry goods in the market. She's been doing this for a year and is earning an amount of about 3,000 PHP a month. 

She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP from GDMPC micro credit to use as capital to purchase additional inventory for her store. She hopes and plans to expand her business to create better living conditions for her family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 41 years old and has three children. She lives in Campo 1, Aurora, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She buys and sells ready-to-wear clothing. Each month Victoria earns 4,200 PHP. She joined GDMPC in 2011. 

She is requesting a 7,000 PHP loan for additional working capital for purchase inventory. In the future, she hopes for her business to grow.

loans.use: to have additional working capital for inventory.

loans.name: Koreti

texts.en: Koreti is 43 years old and married with seven children. She runs a small business selling convenience foods in her community and has been doing this for three years. Koreti has requested a loan to buy flour, a box of chicken, sausages, soy sauce, curry powder and potatoes. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Koreti will improve the standard of her business to earn a good income.

loans.use: to buy flour, a box of chicken, sausages, soy sauce, curry powder and potatoes.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene is from Tagudalo, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 27 years old. Mylene is married and has three children. To make a living, Mylene manages a business venture, providing transportation services. Aside from these services, she also manages her own retail store selling groceries in her community. 

In 2011, Mylene joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business. She is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase canned goods, noodles, sugar, spices and bottled products for sale. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, sugar, spices and bottled products for sale.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en: Nelly is a 34-year-old married woman with four children who lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She has a store where she sells goods in the local community. She has been in this business for four years. In 2007, she joined GDMPC to gain access to micro-finance services and is now requesting 7,000 PHP. She plans to use the loan to purchase bottled products, milk saches, shampoo, biscuits and sugar to sell. She hopes to increase her income and double her capital from her new profits.

loans.use: to purchase bottled products, milk saches, shampoo, biscuits and sugar.

loans.name: Santiago Felipe

texts.es: Santiago es un hombre de 37 años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos, su negocio es la crianza, engorde y venta de pollo, actividad que tiene desde hace 8 años, tiene tres trabajadores asalariado, y de ser cliente de la institución tiene  cuatro años consecutivos, tuvo problemas de perdidas por una suma considerable en la producción de pollo con epidemias, la ventaja que el tiene es que es agricultor y  con la siembra de granos básicos  le ayudo a cancelar su deuda con la institución, actualmente solicita crédito para inversión de pollitos pequeños de engordes, medicamentos por cualquier pestes, alimentos para animal por quintal como es la purina.
texts.en:
Santiago is 37 years old. He is married with two children. For the last eight years he has worked raising, fattening and selling chickens. He has three salaried workers, and to be in the institution you have to be a client for four consecutive years.

He had problems with losses of a considerable sum in the production of chickens with epidemics. He has an advantage in that he is an farmer with land sown with basic grains, which helped him cancel the debt with the institution.

Currently he is asking for this loan to invest in chicks which he can raise, medicine for any pests and animal feed in bulk, like purina.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise, medicine, purina etc.

loans.name: Salomon

texts.es: Don Salomón, tiene a sus cuatro hijos todos trabajando por lo que está muy contento de haberles enseñado el valor del trabajo lo cual es una bendición, su esposa le ayuda con la venta de pulpería en la que ha invertido casi todos sus créditos para mantener las ventas, ahora este nuevo préstamo lo necesita para hacer un cuarto de habitación en su propiedad, comprara los materiales como cemento, arena, hierro, bloques, piedrines para brindarle un mejor espacio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Salomón's four children all have jobs, and he is very happy to have taught them the value of hard work, which is a blessing. His wife helps him run the shop in which he has invested almost all of his loans to increase his sales. He needs this new loan to build a bedroom on his property. He will buy the materials, including cement, sand, rebar, cinder blocks, and gravel, so he can offer his children a better place to live.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, rebar, cinder blocks, and gravel.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 56 años, es una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy responsable. Realiza sus actividades laborales junto a su conviviente  Orlando quien se dedica a la soldadura, hace puertas ventanas de metal.  Sus hijos ya son independientes y viven en la capital.El trabajo de María  consiste en el armado de puertas, ventanas y escaleras de estructura metálica. Tiene un local en el frontis  de  su  vivienda propia. Lleva 08 años en esta actividad económica. Se inicio en este negocio porque su conviviente necesitaba un obrero para pintar las estructuras de las puertas y ventanas. Como no conseguían un ayudante ella se dedico a pintar  y desde entonces decidieron trabajar juntos. Con su esposo salen a buscar clientes en distintos lugares donde requieran estos servicios. Comenta que este rubro le brinda muchas ganancias ya que la ciudad empieza  a crecer y hay más construcciones  que necesitan de sus servicios en el área de carpintería metálica. Cada vez los lugares donde los requieren se hace mas distante a su hogar, por ello cuentan  con una movilidad para transportar sus herramientas de trabajo como su maquina soldadora,  su cortadora de fierro y otros implementos. Le va muy bien ya que cada vez tiene más clientes y eso le permite estar generando ingresos en cada momento. Espera posteriormente poder abrir un taller  y así incrementar sus ganancias  para dar oportunidad de trabajo a otras personas.Con el monto solicitado de 1000 soles comprará algunos materiales como  fierros, planchas de aluminio y  equipos que le hacen falta para su trabajo carpintería metálica.
texts.en:
María, 56 years old, is honest, hard-working, and above all, responsible.  She works alongside her partner, Orlando, who has made a career of soldering metal windows and doors. Their children are now independent and live in the capital. 

María's work consists of assembling metal frame doors, windows, and staircases. She has a shop in the front of her own home. She has eight years of experience in this line of work. She began in the business because her partner needed a worker to paint the door and window frames. When he couldn't find anyone, she began to paint, and since then they have been working together.  

She and her husband go out to look for customers in various places where their services are needed. She comments that this field brings in a lot of income since the city is growing and there is a lot of new construction that needs metalwork services. The sites that need them keep getting further away from their home, so they count on having the mobility to transport their tools, such as the soldering machine, the iron cutter, and other tools. It's going very well for them, and they continue to gain customers, which allows them to earn income.

María hopes they will be able to open a shop and increase their earnings so that they can provide job opportunities to other people.  With the requested loan of 1000 soles, they will purchase various materials, such as iron bars, aluminum sheets, and tools that they need for their metalwork business.

loans.use: purchase iron, aluminum, and other equipment.

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en:
Mr. Battulga, 47 years old, lives with his wife and children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been collecting and selling plastic, glass and metals to a recycling factory for five years and has accumulated a vast amount of experience. His wife makes and sells diary products to local vendors. 

Battulga is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to purchase recycling materials at lower prices from people who wander around garbage dumps and collect bottles, spare parts and timber. After purchasing those materials from people, he sorts them into categories depending on their usage and later supplies them to the recycling factory. 

Recycling itself has great positive impacts on the earth. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to collect recycling materials.

loans.name: Julito

texts.en: Julito is 43 year old and lives in Aurora, Zamboang  del Sur with his three children. For three years he has managed his own farm, planting watermelon for sale. He is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP from GDMPC micro-credit (which he joined in 2007). He will use the loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. He plans to expand his farm in order to gain additional profit for a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, such as manure.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en: Alma is from Lantungan, Aurora. She is 51 years old. She is married and has two kids. Alma makes and sells snack food. Aside from vending foods, she also raises piglets for sale to double her income. In 2011, she joined GDMPC. Alma is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP. This loan will be used to purchase feed and other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies.

loans.name: Leony

texts.en: Leony is a married man with four children who lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. He plants and harvests a variety of vegetables for sale. He has been doing this for three years to provide for the needs of his children. In 2007 he joined GDMPC micro-credit to gain access to micro-finance services. Recently, he borrowed an amount of 5,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. He hopes to generate more income in order to provide for the needs of the entire family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Khit

texts.en:
Khit is a 28-year-old married woman with a child who lives in the Prey Chor district. For over 10 years she has worked in agriculture, which has enabled her to learn a lot from her parents and from practical experiences. Together with her husband, she has been managing one and a half hectares of farmland for growing rice. Agriculture is the sole source of the family's income.

She is asking HKL for a loan to buy farm supplies to prepare the soil to plant rice in the coming raining season. With this investment she hopes her harvest will be more fruitful so she can sell it and earn income that will help with the family's expenses. Her goal is to continue expanding her rice production by buying additional plots of farmland. She also wants to improve her house so that they can live safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to prepare the soil for planting rice.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
Carmela es una mujer de 37 años de edad casada y de su matrimonio tiene 2 hijos los cuales estudian en diferentes grados de educación en la primaria. Ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años la cual aprendió por medio de sus padres ya que ellos se dedican a la agricultura desde toda una vida. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que siempre busca la forma de cómo generar ingresos para su familia y con la ayuda de su esposo pudo iniciar un negocio de pulpería con el cual ayuda en los diferentes gastos del hogar mientras se saca la cosecha de café. Sus clientes son los vecinos que viven en los alrededores de su casa y del café los diferentes compradores que llegan a la zona en busca de un producto sano y de calidad para revender.  

Ella solicita ayuda para la compra fertilización y abono para sus cultivos de café ya que su prioridad es poder sacar una buena cosecha y aprovecharla al máximo. 

Sus Planes para el futuro es ampliar más su pulpería dividiendo los ingresos que entran por parte del cultivo de café una parte y la otra para poder re-invertir en el mismo convirtiéndola en un pequeño mercadito ya que en la zona donde ella habita no hay un negocio fuerte y rentable. Su sueño es darles una educación universitaria a sus hijos ya que ambos están en el colegio y tienen metas y sueños para cumplir y llevar a cabo.
texts.en:
Carmela is a 37-year-old woman who is married and she has 2 children from her marriage who are in different grades of primary school. She has made a living from agriculture for many years, which she learned from her parents as they worked in agriculture for their entire lives. She is an entrepreneurial woman who always seeks a way to generate income for her family. With the help of her husband, she was able to start a small grocery store business, with which she helps with various living expenses while her coffee is harvested. Her clients are the neighbors who live in the areas around her house, and for the coffee, various buyers who come to the area in search of a sound, quality product to resell.

She asks for help to buy fertilizer for her coffee crop, as her priority is to be able to get a good harvest and take maximum advantage of it.

Her plan for the future is to expand her small grocery store and divide the earnings that come in, one part for the coffee crop and the other part to be able to reinvest in the store, turning it into a small market. In the area where she lives, there are no strong and profitable markets.  Her dream is to give her children a university education, as both are in high school and they have goals and dreams to fulfill and carry out.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her coffee

loans.name: Aleyda Yanira

texts.es: Aleyda de 40 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos. Ella posee tortillería y pupusería la cual es muy conocida en la localidad donde reside tiene muchos clientes pues vende. las mejores tortillas y pupusas, calientitas y con el servicio más rápido además a precios realmente accesibles; Aleyda es una mujer emprendedora con ganas de salir adelante, tiene una actitud de ganadora, por eso siempre se mantiene adelante de la competencia, quiere correr el riesgo para poder hacer crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, frijoles, aceite, chicharron, quesillo, etc. Aleyda tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para su familia.
texts.en: Aleyda, 40 years old, lives with her two children. She earns her living making tortillas and pupusas that are famous in her village. She has a lot of customers because she sells the best piping hot tortillas and pupusas with the fastest service and at affordable prices. Aleyda is an enterprising woman who is determined to be successful. She has the attitude of a winner, which is why she is always ahead of her competition. She is willing to take risks to be able to expand her business, so she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn at wholesale, beans, oil, pork rinds, soft cheese, etc. Aleyda hopes that she will be able to provide economic security and a full life to her family.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale, beans, oil, pork rinds, soft cheese, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres  hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y fríjol  y adicional a esto caña de azucar, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; Carlos es un hombre activo, entregado a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta buscando oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, quiere realizar una nueva inversión que le permita aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fríjol, abono, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Carlos  tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Carlos Alberto, 42 years old, lives with his life partner and their three children. He grows corn, beans, and sugar cane. He has been a farmer for several years and has gained valuable experience that allows him to produce better harvests. His fields are in an agricultural area near his home. He sells his harvests throughout the region and has many customers who come to him because he offers high-quality produce, affordable prices, and good service. Carlos is an active man who works hard and is determined to succeed. He is always looking for good opportunities and hopes that a new investment will help him increase his yields. He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy seed corn, beans, fertilizer, pesticides, tools, etc. Carlos has good financial references and is confident that he will be able to pay off his debt and bring his household greater economic security.

loans.use: to buy seed corn, beans, fertilizer, pesticides, tools, etc.

loans.name: Roberto De Jesus

texts.es: Roberto de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa. Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz, maicillo y jocotes. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 20 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra tener una mejor consicion de vida con su esposa.
texts.en:
Roberto is 63 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has made a career of agriculture - specifically, the planting of corn, sorghum, and jocote, a small tropical fruit. He has made his living as a farmer for twenty years. He is a hard-working man, responsible and well known throughout the region for his enormous heart and his friendliness toward others. 

Since it's now planting season, he decided to begin preparations. That's why he decided to request this new loan from INTEGRAL, which he will use to invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, and so on. 

The thing he wants most is an abundant harvest, one better than those before, since this is how he sustains his family. He trusts in God that through his help, dedication, and hard work, he will be able to his and his wife's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, and more.

loans.name: Fidelina Angel

texts.es: Doña Fidelina de 42 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus siete hijos en casa propia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años con las ventas que realiza de sus granos básicos y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir los gastos de su hogar, Doña Fidelina  solicita un crédito que le permita comprar abonos, pesticidas, herbicidas y foliares y  seguir con sus cosechas para poder obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Fidelina is 42 years old, and has been in the agricultural field for twenty years. She lives with her husband and their seven children in their own home. With her sales of dry grains, she and her husband are able to cover their household expenses.

Fidelina is requesting this loan, which she will use to buy soil fertilizers, leaf treatments, herbicides, and pesticides. This will allow her to continue harvesting, earn greater income, and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase soil- and leaf-based fertilizers, pesticide, and herbicide.

loans.name: William

texts.es:
El señor William vive en  Managua,  labora para el estado como vigilante desde hace tres años, su estado civil es soltero, dos persona están bajo su cargo que depende de él, lucha para el bienestar de su hijos. 

Don William  ha soñado con tener una vivienda digna y por ese motivo esta solicitando este crédito para condicionar y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia. 

Espera el apoyo de los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le otorgue el crédito para reparar el techo de dicha vivienda, con el que piensa comprar lamina de cinz, perlin y pago de mano de obra. 

Tiene la fé en Dios que estos inversionistas de buen corazón le brindaran su ayuda para poder cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
William lives in Managua. He has worked for the State as a security guard for the last three years. He is single and has two children who depend on him; he strives to ensure their well-being. 

William has dreamed of having a dignified home and therefore he is asking for this loan to condition and give his family a better standard of living. He hopes for the support of the Kiva investors so that through Ceprodel they will grant him a loan to repair the roof of his home. With the loan he thinks to buy metal plates and beams, and pay for labor. He has faith in God that these good-hearted investors will provide their help in order for him to be able to achieve his dream.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Erick Antonio

texts.es:
Don Erick Antonio vive en una comarca llamada jocote dulce del departamento de  Managua, labora para una institución privada, desempeñándose  como supervisor de cocona desde hace siete año, su estado civil es casado, es una persona responsable con dos hijo  bajo su cargo,  luchadora y con un futuro para  su familia. 

Erick Antonio  se presento a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la reparación del techo de su casa que se encuentra en mal estado, este financiamiento será invertido en compra de perlin, lamina de cinz y pago de mano de obra, ya que estas lluvias se le pasa toda. 

Espera de la mano amiga de kiva- ceprodel, el apoyo de este crédito, que tanto ayuda en el desarrollo de la familia con el deseo de vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Erick Antonio lives in a region called Jocote Dulce in Managua. He has worked for a private company as a kitchen supervisor for seven years. He is married, and is a responsible person and a fighter with two children in his care and a future for his family.

Erick Antonio came to Ceprodel to apply for a loan to repair the roof of his house, which is in poor condition. This funding will be invested in buying beams and zinc and in paying for labor, now that the rains have passed.

He hopes for a helping hand from Kiva-Ceprodel and the support of this loan which helps so much in the development of his family with the desire to live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Malinche Group

texts.es: Este grupo son socios microempresarios, emprendedores formado por tres miembros una de ellas es Rosa mujer casada, con tres hijos, que desde hace 6 años vende nacatamales, gaseosas, refrescos naturales en su domicilio y tiene 20 ciclos de préstamos inicio con un monto menor en esa época que poco a poco fue diversificando su negocio ya que solo vendía nacatamales, de ser cliente de la institución tiene 7 años consecutivos, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas variadas en sabor y tamaño,tambien invertira en  materia prima  para hacer los nacatamales como carne de cerdo, arroz, maíz, cal, leñas, mecate, achiote, sal, vegetales como chiltoma, cebolla, tomate etc. María tiene 34 años de edad y su negocio es la hecha y venta de tortilla y Nester tiene 46 años de edad y su negocio es la de un taller de refrigeración.
texts.en:
This is a group of small business owners, formed by three members who are entrepreneurs. One of them is Rosa, a married woman with three children. For the last 6 years she has sold nacatamales, soft drinks, and fruit drinks in her home. She has had 20 loan cycles; she began with a smaller amount at that time and has been diversifying her business little by little. She used to sell just nacatamales. She has been a client of the institution for 7 consecutive years.

She will invest this loan in buying soft drinks of different flavors and sizes, raw material for nacatamal [tamales] like pork, rice, corn, lime, firewood, twine, annatto, salt, and vegetables like peppers, onion, and tomato, etc.

María is 34 years old and her business is making and selling tortillas. Nester is 46 years old and his business is a refrigerator repair shop.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks of different flavors and sizes, raw material for nacatamal [tamales]

loans.name: Ines De Jesus

texts.es: Don Inés vive junto a su compañera de vida y su nieta, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y  fríjol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, don Inés se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, quiere aumentar la  producción pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fríjol, y fertilizante, herbicidas, abonos, etc. asi como muestra la fotografia. Don Inés tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Inés lives together with his life partner and his grandchild. He grows corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for many years, and so he has a lot of experience in this line of work.

He is well known in the area and has a good customer base as he has the best crops. He sells the top quality produce at affordable prices. Furthermore, his customer service is second to none! Inés is known for his friendly nature. 

He wants to increase production but to do so he needs financial support. For this reason he is making this request to Integral. This loan will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertiliser, herbicides and manure, etc., as shown in the photo. 

Inés’ reputation is as a person with an unblemished moral character, responsible and with a good payment history. He is confident that he will be able to pay his debt, and at the same time provide a full life to his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertiliser, herbicides, manure, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Condega un municipio conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora. En una comunidad aledaña conocida como el Níspero, Vive el señor Miguel, con su esposa y su hija a la que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, él de profesión, agricultor, en el área de granos básicos y la ganadería en repasto de novillos y ganado de leche  es conocido  como una persona honesta y trabajadora con más de 10 años de experiencia.

Su propiedad tiene un área de 14 manzanas de extensión todas aptas para cultivo de granos básicos y ganado siendo un área productiva  

Recientemente visitó  Ceprodel y está solicitando un crédito para comprar tres novillos de engorde donde piensa salir beneficiado. El impacto y beneficios que tendrá  él y su familia son de una forma positiva al explotar su finca en uno de los mejores rubros de zona, mejorando su nivel de vida y condiciones económicas con los ingresos obtenidos con la venta de ganado luego de repastarlos y venderlos al matadero.
texts.en:
Condega: a town known for its pottery, crafts, and hard-working people. In a neighboring community known as Níspero lives Miguel, with his wife and daughter, whom he supports and sends to school. He is a professional farmer, specializing in growing grains and cattle ranching, both bulls and milk cows. He is well known as an honest and hard-working person, with more than ten years of experience.

His property consists of 14 acres, all perfect for growing grains and grazing cattle, as it is a productive area.

He recently stopped by Ceprodel to ask for a loan to purchase three young bulls for fattening, from which he expects to profit. The impact and the benefit to his family will be a positive use of his farm, which is one of the best plots in the region. He intends to first graze the animals, and then sell them for slaughter. The income he will gain from selling the cattle will improve his quality of life and his economic situation.

loans.use: purchase three beef cattle.

loans.name: José Daniel

texts.es:
José Daniel  es originario de Granada pero por cosa de la vida actualmente vive en Managua, labora en una Universidad  privada, desempeñándose  como agente de seguridad desde hace cinco años, su estado civil es casado, es una persona responsable con tres hijos bajo su cargo,  es una persona que lucha junto a su esposa. 

José Daniel  se presento a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la construcción de una pared que se encuentra en mal estado, este financiamiento será invertido en compra de bloque, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra. 

Estima que a fines de año su vivienda estará mejor, pero para entonces necesita que Ceprodel y Kiva le brinden este tipo de crédito, de momento solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, y su honradez.
texts.en:
José Daniel comes from Granada, but due to circumstances in life he lives in Managua. He has been working as a security guard for a private university for the past five years. He's married, and he's a responsible person with three children under his responsibility. He's a person who works hard alongside his wife.

José Daniel turned to Ceprodel in order to request a loan for building a wall which is currently in bad condition. This loan will be used to purchase bricks, cement, sand and iron, and to pay for labor.

He estimates that by year's end his house will be improved, but for that he needs Ceprodel and Kiva to provide him with this type of loan. At the moment he only has his health, his ability to work and his integrity.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies.

loans.name: Eveling De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Doña Eveling de los Ángeles  vive en Managua, labora en una institución del estado, desempeñándose  como auxiliar administrativo desde hace doce años, es madre soltera que ha venido luchando por el bienestar de su familia. 

Doña Eveling de los Ángeles  se presento a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para poder pagar  titulo  de la carrera de administración de empresas de su hija. 

Con este  financiamiento que Kiva-Ceprodel le  brindaría es para apoyar a su hija en su carrera profesional, agradece una vez por la ayuda que le han brindando.
texts.en:
Doña Eveling de los Ángeles lives in Managua.  For the last twelve years, she has worked hard as an administrative assistant in a state institution.  She is a single mother who has been fighting for the well-being of her family.

She is seeking a loan from Ceprodel in order to pay tuition expenses for her daughter, who is studying business administration.  This loan through Kiva and Ceprodel will be used to support her daughter in her professional studies. She is grateful for this support.

loans.use: to cover tuition costs.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Luis Antonio de cuarenta año es originario del departamento de nueva guinea, pero actualmente vive en un barrio de Managua,  labora para el estado como vigilante desde hace cinco año, es una persona casada con una responsabilidad  de cuatro persona bajo su cargo. 

Toda su vida ha soñado con tener una vivienda digna que tenga todas las condiciones adecuadas para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia. Por tal razón  esta solicitando un crédito a los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le otorgue un crédito para repellar pared de dicha vivienda con el que piensa comprar cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra. Tiene la fé en Dios que estos inversionistas de buen corazón le aprueben su solicitud para llevar a cabo su inversión.
texts.en:
Luis Antonio, forty years old, is originally from the department of Nueva Guinea, but he currently lives in a neighborhood of Managua. For the last five years, he has worked for the state as a guard. He is married, and is responsible for the four people living under his care.

All his life he has dreamed of having a dignified home that has all of the necessary amenities to give his family a better life. For this reason, he is asking the Kiva investors, through Ceprodel, for a loan that will allow him to plaster the walls of this home.  He will purchase concrete and sand, and pay for labor.  He has faith in God that these kindhearted investors will approve his request, letting him carry out his project.

loans.use: purchase goods and labor to plaster the walls of his home.

loans.name: San Isidro De Yungaqui Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “San Isidro de Yungaqui” perteneciente a la comunidad de Yungaqui en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Karen Milagros  ella es soltera  y tiene 25 años de edad; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracia al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.
Los otros socios  se dedican a la crianza de animales menores, venta de quesos, venta de pollos, venta de papa, ganadería, taller de mecánica.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Karen Milagros is a 25-year-old single woman who belongs to the communal bank “San Isidro de Yungaqui”, which is located in the community of Yungaqui  in the district of Anta, which is in the province of Anta in the department of Cusco.

She has a grocery store, in which she sells various products, such as rice, sugar, milk, candy and soft drinks.  Business is going well thanks to the efforts she puts into her business every day.  In this way she is able to make progress.

She is seeking a loan in order to buy merchandise such as soft drinks for her store.

The other members of the group are involved in such business activities as:

- Raising animals
- Selling cheese
- Selling potatoes
- Selling chickens
- Automotive repair

Karen Milagros wishes to thank those who are helping to make her dream possible through this loan.  She promises to repay her loan according to the agreed-upon schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Rosette

texts.en:
Rosette is a client who is married to Isah. The couple has four children, three of whom are not at school, due to a lack of ability to pay their school fees. 

Rosette has applied for UGX 800,000 to facilitate her in purchasing another sewing machine, which she will use to train her village mates at a small fee. This will enable her to increase her income and train her children as well for their future benefit, since they do not have enough money to pay for a formal education. 

(L to R) In the photo is the client's husband (who signed the waiver form), the client herself and the Ugafode credit officer.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Flabia

texts.en: Flabia is a farmer in Ruhaama  and married to Keneth, a primary teacher. She wants to buy fertilizer to use in her newly planted banana plantation to enable her to increase the income of the family and be able to pay tuition for their children as well as adequately meet the family's basic needs. She is grateful to be partnering with Kiva and is sure it will work out well. In the photograph is the client, her husband and the Ugafode credit officer (left to right) standing in the banana plantation for which they intend to buy manure.

loans.use: To buy organic manure

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Нурали 32 года, он холост и еще не обзавел семью. Он живет в районе Вахш в одном доме с отцом и семьёй брата. Нурали коммуникабельный и честный человек. У него среднее образование. Нурали на протяжении четырех лет занимается животноводством. Район Вахш имеет хорошие пастбищные места. Нурали в основном разводит крупно-рогатый скот в таких пастбищах и по прошествию месяца продает их с наценкой на скотном рынке района. Он зарабатывает на жизнь за счет купли-продажи скота. Нурали запрашивает кредит для закупа бычков для продолжения своей деятельности и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Nurali is 32 years old. He is unmarried and has not yet started a family. He lives in the Vakhsh district in one house with his father and his brother's family. Nurali is a communicative and honest man. He has a secondary education. For the past four years, Nurali has practiced animal husbandry. The Vakhsh district has good grazing pastures. Nurali primarily raises cattle in these pastures and, after a few months, sells them for a profit at the district cattle market. He makes his living through the purchase and resale of cattle. Nurali is requesting a loan to buy bulls for the continuation of his business. He thanks you in advance for the assistance.

loans.use: to purchase and resell cattle

loans.name: Pitahaya Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Antonia, mujer de 48 años de edad, casada con cinco hijos, su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace 4 años anteriormente se dedica hacer ama de casa, tiene cuatro años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, papel higiénico, sal, leña, carne de res, carne de pollo, pampers etc. María tiene 54 años de edad y su negocio también es de una pulpería, y Maribel tiene 44 años y su negocio es la venta de gaseosas, pollo, mortadelas, hielo.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three successful entrepreneurial partners. One of them is Antonia, a 48-year-old woman who is married with five children. Her business is a small grocery store she has had in her home for the last four years. Prior to that she was a housewife. She has been a client of the institution for four years. The loan will be invested in the purchase of grains like rice, sugar, oil, beans, toilet paper, salt, firewood, beef, chicken, diapers, etc.

María is 54 years old and her business is also a small grocery store.  Maribel is 44 years old and her business is the sale of soft drinks, chicken, mortadella, and ice.

loans.use: to buy grains like rice, as well as sugar, oil, beans, toilet paper, salt, firewood, beef, chicken, diapers, etc.

loans.name: Juan Isidro

texts.es: Juan de 52 años de edad se dedica a cultivar la tierra.  Con mucha dedicación cultiva maíz y maicillo y también jocote desde hace 20 años, lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable. Habita junto a su  grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus seis hijos de 19, 16, 14, 12,10 y 5 años de edad. Junto a su esposa trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. Gracias a los conocimientos en la agricultura es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar, que es su principal fuente de ingresos, dado que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente.  Con muchos deseos de superación se acerco a esta institución para solicitar crédito ya que necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. para la siembra. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá acceder a una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en: Juan is 52 years old and works in agriculture. He has worked hard growing corn, sorghum, and jocote (hog plum) for 20 years, which enables him to put food on the table. He is a hard-working, honorable, and responsible man. He lives with his family which is made up of his six children aged 19, 16, 14, 12, 10, and 5. He and his wife work hard to provide for the family. Thanks to his knowledge of farming, which is his sole source of income, he has been able to support his family. This is the only way he knows how to make a living in an honorable way. He has a strong desire to progress in life, and this is why he came to the institution to apply for a loan which he will invest in the purchase of farming supplies such as seeds, manure, insecticides, etc. for sowing his crops. He trusts in God and in his work that this will help him to have an abundant harvest and, in this way, he will be able to get a better quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Fe Y Alegria Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatros socias una de ellas es María Esperanza mujer de 46 años de edad, casada y tiene 15 años de vender verduras ahora al por mayor, anteriormente su negocio no era muy grande a como lo es en la actualidad que vende al por mayor en los diferentes mercados de la capital, le paga a dos personas que le ayudan en el negocio, tiene 6 años de ser cliente en la institución, su crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos de verduras como tomate manzano, tomate criollo, chiltoma, cebollas, ajos, también comercializa venta de frijol al por mayor. María tiene 41 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y venta de ropa nueva, Dulce tiene 43 años de edad su negocio es la venta de comida rápida y Miriam tiene 41 años de edad su negocio es alquilar   cuartos.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of four members, one of whom is María Esperanza.  She is a 46-year-old married woman who has been selling vegetables wholesale for fifteen years.

At first her business was not as big as it is now. She sells her goods wholesale in different markets in the capital and employs two other people in her business.  She has been a client of this institution for six years.

She will use the loan proceeds to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, garlic and beans for resale.

The other members of the group are:

- Dulce, 43, who sells fast food  
- Miriam, 41, who rents out rooms
- María, 41, who sells cosmetics and new clothing

loans.use: to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, garlic and beans to resell at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Tzucubal 1 Group

texts.es:
Manuel  (de  playera  gris, segundo de izquierda a derecha) es el líder del Grupo Tzucubal 1 (Buscador en lengua nativa del lugar) es un señor  de 53 años de edad quien  tiene 4 de los cuales 3 son hombre y 1 mujer, todos ellos casado y viven en la Aldea Tzucubal, municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá.
El es agricultor, la siembra, mantenimiento y producción de maíz  lo realiza en su parcela ubicada en la aldea donde vive, eligió esta actividad por herencia de su padre y también porque a través de ellos genera alimento para su familia porque el maíz es la base de la alimentación en su comunidad y también le genera ingresos porque parte de la producción la vende en el mercado local.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de fertilizante para el mantenimiento de su maíz.
Con los ingresos que obtiene sueña con  mejorar su vivienda para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel (wearing a gray t-shirt, the second one from left to right) is the leader of the Tzucubal 1 communal bank (tzucubal means seeker in the local native language). He's a 53-year-old gentleman who has four children, three of whom are men and one is a woman. They're all married and live in the village of Tzucubal, municipality of Nahualá, department of Sololá.
He's a farmer who plants, grows and harvests corn in a plot of land located in the village where he lives. He chose this line of work because it was his father's legacy and also because with it he produces food for his family. Corn is the staple food in his community and also earns him a profit, since he sells part of his produce in the local market.
He's requesting a loan so he can purchase fertilizer in order to adequately maintain his corn crop.
He dreams of using his profits to improve his home so that he can provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer in order to adequately maintain the corn crop.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana es una mujer muy amable, responsable y trabajadora, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa desde hace 8 años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtienen logra solventar los gastos de su hogar y poder sacar adelante a sus hija, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar blusa, faldas, camisas, etc. por mayor para poder surtir su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias para poder darle a sus hijas todo lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Ana’s a very kind, responsible, hardworking woman.  She lives in her own house with her two daughters; she’s a single mother.  She has worked for the last 8 years in her business selling clothes.  It’s located in a market near her place of residence.  With profits earned she manages to cover her household expenses and move her daughters forward.  Ana’s asking for a loan to be able to buy blouses, skirts, shirts, etc. at wholesale to stock her business and earn higher profits to provide everything her daughters need with no limitations whatsoever.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Eduardo Antonio

texts.es: Eduardo de 30 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 6 años su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, Eduardo esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas, etc. para seguir con su siembra ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para comprar todo lo que necesita y asi el pueda obtener mejores ganancias para poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 30 years old and has made a living from agriculture for the last 6 years. His primary crops are corn and beans. With the earnings that he obtains he manages to cover his household expenses. He lives in a house he owns with his wife and their two children.

Eduardo is asking for a loan to be able to buy the supplies necessary to continue his sowing, like fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, etc., as he isn't able to buy everything he needs with what he earns. In this way he will have better earnings to be able to give his family more economic stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: David Adalberto

texts.es: David de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra maíz y maicillo, con las ganacais que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, David esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar todo lo necesario para su siembra como semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. y poder obtener mejores cosechas para darle a su familia luna mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: David’s 33-years-old living in his own house with his wife and two children.  He’s worked in agriculture for several years growing corn and sorghum.  With profits earned he’s able to pay some of his household expenses.  David’s asking for a loan to be able to buy everything needed for his crops like seeds, fertilizer, manure, etc. to obtain better harvests in order to give better economic stability to his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Don Alfonso de 45 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años siembra los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son el maíz y el frijol, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive con su esposa y sus 8 hijos  en casa propia, don Alfonso esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas, semillas, etc. para tener una mejor cosecha y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Alfonso, 45, has worked in agriculture for the last 20 years growing the main basic grains from the zone like corn and beans.  With profits earned he’s able to cover his household expenses.  He lives with his wife and 8 children in his own house.  Alfonso’s asking for a loan to be able to buy fertilizer, manure, herbicide, seeds, etc. to have a better harvest and be able to give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Altamirano Group

texts.es: El grupo “Altamirano” está integrado por seis personas, todas son mujeres muy trabajadoras es un grupo que le gusta convivir lo que las caracteriza es la gran amistad que hay entre ellas. Platican las integrantes del grupo que ellas mismas eligieron el nombre porque donde inició el grupo y que solía ser el punto de reunión, se encontraba una granja de animales con el nombre de "Altamirano".  María Isabel  forma parte del grupo, tiene 40 años de edad está casada con el señor Martin quien trabaja en el campo y como obrero juntos han formado una familia con un niño que ya va a la escuela. Isabel es muy joven, pero a su corta edad se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos Isabel comento “Desde chica mi papa me impulso para cuidar esos animalitos me decía que era una buena manera para ayudar a mi esposo con los gastos del hogar”  Isabel lleva tres años con su actividad le gusta mucho y más cuando ya están grandes y venderlos aunque una de las dificultades es para venderlos a buen precio  muchas veces no valoran todo el trabajo y esfuerzo que le tomó criarlos. Isabel compra los animalitos desde pequeños, los cuida durante algunos meses al parecer el alimento para los cerdos está muy caro pero sin  el alimento sus cerditos no pueden crecer grandes y fuertes esta vez está solicitando el crédito para comprar cuatro cerdos que piensa vender cuando su familia se encuentre en algún problema económico como lo que están viviendo actualmente: su niño tiene una fuerte infección en sus ojitos y los gastos son mayores. Isabel comentó sonriendo “Me gustaría tener una mejor calidad de vida para mi niño que algún día el pudiera llegar a tener un buen trabajo y no sufriera carencias” Isabel está segura de poder seguir con la crianza de sus cerditos para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Todas las integrantes del grupo están muy contentas y agradecidas porque cada una de ellas podrá invertir en su negocio. Patricia, Jessica, Alberta y Elvira invertirán en cerdos; Teresa, en borregos.
texts.en:
The “Altamirano” group consists of six people, all very hardworking women.  It’s a group that likes to socialize and is noted for the great friendship that exists among them.  The members of the group relate that they chose the name themselves because there was an animal farm called “Altamirano” in the zone where the group first became organized and where they usually met.

María Isabel, 40, is a member of the group.  She’s married to Martín who works as a field hand and they’ve formed a family together; they have a son who is now attending school.  Isabel is very young but at her young age she works raising and selling pigs.  Isabel commented: “Ever since I was a girl my father encouraged me to care for these little animals; he’d tell me that it was a good way to help my husband with household expenses.”  Isabel has been in her activity for three years and she likes it very much, even more so when they are big and she can sell them although one of the difficulties for selling them at a good price is that often the hard work and effort that went into raising them isn’t valued.

Isabel buys the animals when they are little and cares for them for a few months.  It seems that feed for pigs is very expensive but without it her little piglets won’t be able to grow big and strong.  This time she’s asking for the loan to buy four pigs that she intends to sell whenever her family faces any economic problem like the one they are living through at present: her little boy has a strong eye infection and expenses are greater.

Isabel commented with a smile: “I’d like to have better quality of life for my little boy so that someday he can have a good job and not suffer from any wants.”  Isabel is sure that she’ll be able to continue raising piglets to help her husband with household expenses.  

All the group members are very happy and grateful because each one of them will be able to invest in her business.  Patricia, Jessica, Alberta and Elvira will invest in pigs and Teresa in sheep.

loans.use: to buy four piglets.

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru:
Клара замужем. У нее трое детей. Она работает воспитательницей в детском саду. Ее муж работает за границей.
Клара живет в одноэтажном доме. Она трудолюбивая и ответственная. Очень любит детей, как своих, так и тех, кого она воспитывает в детском саду.
 
Клара просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 10,000 гривен. Она хочет заменить старые окна в доме и входную дверь. Она сможет сэкономить тепло в зимний сезон.
texts.en:
Klara is married with three children. She works as a kindergarten teacher and her husband works abroad. 

Klara lives in a one-story home. She is hard-working and responsible. She loves children, both her own and those whom she looks after at the kindergarten. 

She is asking for a loan of 10,000 hryvnas, so she can replace some old windows in her home, as well as the front door so she will be able to save on heating in the winter.

loans.use: put new energy saving windows and door

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy foods such as ice, jellies, yucca, plantains, potatoes, oil, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Productivas Group

texts.es:
La señora Zonia Patricia de estado civil casada, cuenta con 31 años de edad, curso 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos y los 2 estan estudiando, ella se dedica a compra y venta de productos por catálogos, inició este negocio por sus amigas que le consiguierion este negocio y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a taxista.

Organiza un grupo y decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra y venta de productos por catálogos, en el futuro desea tener su propio capital y seguir trabajando mas fuerte, las demás intgrantes del grupo se dedican a venta de productos por catálogo, venta de ropa para dama y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Zonia Patricia, 31, is married.  She completed six years of primary school.  She has two children both of whom are attending school. She works buying and selling products via catalog.  She started this business thanks to girlfriend who got the business for her.  To date, she has 8 years’ experience in it and her husband, who works as a taxi driver, supports her.

She organized a group to request a loan she’ll use to buy catalog products to resell.  In future, she’d like to have her own capital and continue working harder.  The other group members sell products via catalog, sell women’s clothes and raise animals.

loans.use: to buy catalog merchandise to resell.

loans.name: Tzcubal 2 Group

texts.es:
Cristóbal (primero de izquierda a derecha) es el líder del Grupo Tzucubal 2 (Buscador) es un señor  de 55 años de edad quien  tiene 8 de los cuales 2 son hombres y 6 mujeres, ellos viven en la Aldea Tzucubal, municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá.
